quotes.quote: In America any boy may become President and I suppose it's just one of the risks he takes.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson Jr.

quotes.quote: There is a New America every morning when we wake up. It is upon us whether we will it or not.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson Jr.

quotes.quote: America's greatest strength, and its greatest weakness, is our belief in second chances, our belief that we can always start over, that things can be made better.
quotes.author: Anthony Walton

quotes.quote: America is a large, friendly dog in a very small room. Every time it wags its tail, it knocks over a chair.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: America, we are better than these last eight years. We are a better country than this.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I know starting careers in troubled times is a challenge, but it is also a privilege. Because it's moments like these that force us to try harder, dig deeper and to discover gifts we never knew we had. To find the greatness that lies within each of us. So don't ever shy away from that endeavor. Don't stop adding to your body of work. I can promise that you will be the better for that continued effort as will be this nation that we all love.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: In recent years, we've become enamored with our own past success. Lulled into complacency by the glitter of our own achievements. We've become accustomed to the title of Military Superpower, forgetting the qualities that got us there. We've become accustomed to our economic dominance in the world, forgetting that it wasn't reckless deals and get rich quick schemes that got us where we are, but hard work and smart ideas, quality products and wise investments.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: That is the American story. People, just like you, following their passions, determined to meet the times on their own terms. They weren't doing it for the money. Their titles weren't fancy. But they changed the course of history and so can you.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: America's one of the finest countries anyone ever stole.
quotes.author: Bobcat Goldthwaite

quotes.quote: There's the country of America, which you have to defend, but there's also the idea of America. America is more than just a country, it's an idea. An idea that's supposed to be contagious.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: I see America, not in the setting sun of a black night of despair ahead of us, I see America in the crimson light of a rising sun fresh from the burning, creative hand of God. I see great days ahead, great days possible to men and women of will and vision.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: The trouble with America is that there are far too many wide-open spaces surrounded by teeth.
quotes.author: Charles Luckman

quotes.quote: America is the greatest, freest and most decent society in existence. It is an oasis of goodness in a desert of cynicism and barbarism. This country, once an experiment unique in the world, is now the last best hope for the world.
quotes.author: Dinesh D'Souza

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with America that the faith, love of freedom, intelligence and energy of her citizens cannot cure.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: The United States is a nation of laws: badly written and randomly enforced.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: America is therefore the land of the future, where, in the ages that lie before us, the burden of the World's History shall reveal itself.
quotes.author: Georg W. Hegel

quotes.quote: England and America are two countries separated by a common language.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: America is a young country with an old mentality.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: America has never been an empire. We may be the only great power in history that had the chance, and refused ï¿½ preferring greatness to power and justice to glory.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: America has never been united by blood or birth or soil. We are bound by ideals that move us beyond our backgrounds, lift us above our interests and teach us what it means to be citizens.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: America will never run... And we will always be grateful that liberty has found such brave defenders.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: By heritage and by choice, the United States of America will make that stand.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The business of America is not business. Neither is it war. The business of america is justice and securing the blessings of liberty.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: In the United States there is more space where nobody is than where anybody is. That is what makes America what it is.
quotes.author: Henry Ford II

quotes.quote: What's right about America is that although we have a mess of problems, we have great capacity - intellect and resources - to do some thing about them.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: America - a great social and economic experiment, noble in motive and far-reaching in purpose.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: I'm not going to quit. Why should I quit? This country is worth fighting for.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: This is the story of America. Everybody's doing what they think they're supposed to do.
quotes.author: Jeffery F. Chamberlain

quotes.quote: In a country as big as the United States, you can find fifty examples of anything.
